author: rcmatthews
msg: Change root icons so that they remain on the desktop after opening an windowed view of the object. (Before they would be removed, and henced replaced by the open view.)

msg: Detaile message view was not showing properly.  Have removed the extra scroll border to allow the content to display properly.
